achievements.name: The Battle for Bokha
achievements.description: Playing as Kislev, win the quest battle to free Boris Ursus.

achievements.name: Animated Adversary
achievements.description: Play a multiplayer battle.

achievements.name: Obliterate the Odds
achievements.description: Win a campaign battle in which you are outnumbered 10-to-1.

achievements.name: Quest for Success
achievements.description: Fight a quest battle.

achievements.name: Talented Amateur
achievements.description: Win 10 battles during a single campaign.

achievements.name: Professional Tactician
achievements.description: Win 50 battles during a single campaign.

achievements.name: The Art of Surprise
achievements.description: Win 5 ambush battles during a single campaign.

achievements.name: Blazing Besieger
achievements.description: Win 25 siege attack battles during a single campaign.

achievements.name: The Road to Riches
achievements.description: Playing as Cathay, complete a Caravan's journey.

achievements.name: Heavens Above
achievements.description: Playing as Cathay, construct the Grand Observatory of Xing Po.

achievements.name: Man the Wall

achievements.name: Celestial City Secured
achievements.description: Playing as Cathay, occupy Wei-Jin.

achievements.name: Shoulders of Giants
achievements.description: Playing as Cathay, recruit a Terracotta Sentinel to one of your armies.

achievements.description: Have 3 special mounts.

achievements.name: White Hat
achievements.description: Have 1 level 10 Hero.

achievements.name: Centres of Excellence
achievements.description: Have 2 level 20 Heroes at the same time.

achievements.name: The Height of Valour
achievements.description: Have 3 level 30 Heroes at the same time.

achievements.name: Rising Power
achievements.description: Have a level 10 Lord.

achievements.name: Dominating Force
achievements.description: Have a level 20 Lord.

achievements.name: Peak Nobility
achievements.description: Have a level 30 Lord.

achievements.name: The Gatekeeper
achievements.description: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Brass Citadel in the realm of Khorne.

achievements.name: The Gardener
achievements.description: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Mansion of the Plaguelord in the realm of Nurgle.

achievements.name: The Courtesan
achievements.description: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Palace of Slaanesh in the realm of Slaanesh.

achievements.name: The Librarian
achievements.description: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Impossible Fortress in the realm of Tzeentch.

achievements.name: Tear Down the Walls
achievements.description: Raze 1 settlement.

achievements.name: Burn the World
achievements.description: Raze 30 settlements during a single campaign.

achievements.name: Forward Position
achievements.description: Construct an allied outpost in a military ally's settlement.

achievements.name: Most Constant Votary
achievements.description: Playing as the Daemon Prince, ascend to a Chaos God's path.

achievements.name: Godly Might Given
achievements.description: Playing as the Daemon Prince, ascend to the Undivided path.

achievements.name: Benisons of the Capricious
achievements.description: Playing as the Daemon Prince, unlock 15 Daemonic Gifts.

achievements.name: Boons of the Mercurial
achievements.description: Playing as the Daemon Prince, unlock 5 Daemonic Gifts.

achievements.name: Common Cause
achievements.description: Have a military alliance with 5 other factions at the same time.

achievements.name: League of Nations
achievements.description: Have a military alliance with 10 other factions at the same time.

achievements.name: Commercial Comforts
achievements.description: Have a trade agreement with 5 other factions at the same time.

achievements.name: Trading Nation
achievements.description: Have a trade agreement with 10 other factions at the same time.

achievements.name: A Steady Stream
achievements.description: Have a gross income of 5,000 per turn.

achievements.name: Well-Heeled
achievements.description: Have a gross income of 20,000 per turn.

achievements.name: Your Coffers Overfloweth
achievements.description: Have a gross income of 60,000 per turn.

achievements.name: Into the Aethyr
achievements.description: Enter the Realm of Chaos using a Rift.

achievements.name: The Blood Must Flow
